content: FRANKFURT U.S. packaging group Westrock  has put a unit making soap dispensers and perfume sprayers up for sale in a potential $1 billion deal  as it seeks to streamline its portfolio after a recent merger  three people close to the matter said.

content: FRANKFURT  Nov 18 U.S. packaging group Westrock  has put a unit making soap dispensers and perfume sprayers up for sale in a potential $1 billion deal  as it seeks to streamline its portfolio after a recent merger  three people close to the matter said.
